participant_1.background:
I am a healthy weight.
I get to be myself when I play with my dogs and make pottery.
I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
i enjoy visiting museums.
my hobbies include rock collecting and making macaroni art.

participant_2.background:
I will not care about what my family thinks.
i can t go a single day without eating ice cream.
I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house.
i am studying literature.
my favorite food is pizza.

content.text: Hello there! I hope you are doing well today.
Hello! I am doing great! Thank you for asking. What about you?
I am doing okay, thank you! I am excited to meet new people and learn more about them.
I am happy to hear that! What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy visiting museums, rock collecting, and making macaroni art. I also love to play with my dogs.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I enjoy reading and writing. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
I love to read as well! What kind of books do you like to read?
I enjoy reading all sorts of books, but I especially like historical fiction and contemporary romance novels.
I have not read much historical fiction, but I have read a few contemporary romance novels. I enjoy them a lot!
They are my favorite! I love the characters and the stories. What are some of your favorite books?
I really enjoyed the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon and the Bridgerton series by Julia Quinn.
I have heard good things about both of those series! I will have to check them out.
